data.name: کوشاکار (نماینده رسمی شرکت هوآوی اینترپرایز)
data.description: Koosha Networks is an official Huawei Enterprise partner with a focus on Networking, Data Center infrastructure, Telecommunications (transmission/access), Unified Communication, and Data Storage products and solutions. We differentiate ourselves with technical expertise, and diversity of product offerings. We provide advanced Pre-Sales Consultation, Project Assessment, Solution Design and Implementation, and Technical Support. We are experiencing organic growth and our main asset is YOU!
